LTOKEN is 0x2820 bytes long
  * 0x10=[IMEI]
  * 0x10=LTOKEN1.0
  * 0x200=HWID
  * 0x600=bootloader(0xA0000000-0xA0000600)
  * 0x2000=seczone(0xA03FA000-0xA03FC000)
  * HWID+bootloader+seczone are encrypted
 
UTOKEN is 0x2090 bytes long
  * 0x10=UTOKEN1.0
  * 0x2000=seczone(0xA03FA000-0xA03FC000)
  * 0x80=hash
  * only seczone is encrypted
